contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox nobility| | name =Zofia Branicka | image =Zofia Branicka (1790-1879).jpg | caption = | spouse =[[Artur Potocki (1787-1832)|Artur Potocki]] | issue =Adam Józef Potocki<br>Aleksandra (1818-19)<br>Maria (1819-22)<br>Alfred (1820-21) | full name = | CoA =[[Korczak Coat of Arms|Korczak]] | noble family =[[Branicki (Korczak)|Branicki]] | father =[[Franciszek Ksawery Branicki]] | mother =[[Aleksandra von Engelhardt|Aleksandra von Engelbrandt]] | birth_date ={{birth date|1790|1|11}} | birth_place =[[Warsaw]], [[Poland]] | death_date ={{Death date and age|1879|1|6|1790|1|11}} | death_place =[[Krzeszowice]], [[Poland]] |}} Countess '''Zofia Branicka''' (1790–1879) was a [[Poland|Polish]] [[szlachcianka|noble woman]], art collector. She had been married to Artur Potocki since 1816. ==Further reading== *Maria Kalergi, ''Listy do Adama Potockiego'', ed. by Halina Kenarowa, translated from French by Halina Kenarowa and Róża Drojecka, Warszawa, 1986. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Branicka, Zofia | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1790-01-11 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Warsaw]], [[Poland]] | DATE OF DEATH = 1879-01-06 | PLACE OF DEATH = [[Krzeszowice]], [[Poland]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Branicka, Zofia}} [[Category:1790 births]] [[Category:1879 deaths]] [[Category:Branicki (Korczak) family|Zofia]] {{Poland-noble-stub}}
